item.description:
Learn the Basics of the Myers-Briggs, the 16 types, which type you are, and how to communicate well to all 16 types. Herb will use props to act out the types! The Myers-Briggs is a must - to understand people and it covers many bases the Enneagram doesn't touch. It's also the most widely known personality system in the world.

Herb Pearce has been teaching personality systems for over 2 decades and has been a therapist for over 3 decades. He is the author of The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram and his writing a 2nd book on "Herb's Tips for Living" to be out by the end of the year. He's a therapist, personal life coach and teaches personality systems to groups and organizations.

www.herbpearce.com
herb@herbpearce.com
781 648 3737
item.name: Myers-Briggs
